title: Yet another hit
review:
From the get go, audience is given a feel of how the movie is going to go and flow.
Spielberg found the absolute perfect actor to fill the shoes of the con man with the perfect casting of LDC.
It's very easy to see why all the women fall prey of this charmer. He was a fast talker and a smooth operator who was able to perfectly portray the character. A classic on my books.
